Package com.ben12.reta.view.validation

Class ValidationDecorator<N extends javafx.scene.Node>

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
com.ben12.reta.view.validation.ValidationDecorator<N>
Type Parameters:
N - Decorated node type
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyValidation, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
@DefaultProperty("child") public class ValidationDecorator<N extends javafx.scene.Node> extends javafx.scene.layout.Region implements PropertyValidation
Node validation decorator.

Beno√Æt Moreau (ben.12)
